snippet.title: Battle Mages E3 video
snippet.description:
Battle Mages (released in 2003) is a high-scale game that combines tactical strategy, quality role-playing system and original adventure elements. The game takes place in a classic fantasy world, where different races and nations live side by side. 
     Put on the mage's cloak and learn how it feels to be an ordinary wizard. You will have to find the strength to right the wrong, to unite various races against common enemy. Dive into the wonderful world, spoiled by insidious traitors and avid ideas.
